name: z(WIP/FUTURE?) TicketTab Beta - Upcoming Tab

*[Event Hub I (for Beta)](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/VI-165 ) - [iOS](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10490)/[Android](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-7293)

*[Buy Tickets View (Legacy)](https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/suites/view/192826&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc )

*[Offers (Legacy)](https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/suites/view/416479&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=1224680 ) **deprecated for BetaTicketTab
*[Fan 2 Fan - Phase 2 (Tesla) - Ballpark Client](https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/suites/view/610058&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc ) **revisit with 'Sell My Tickets' [Sell My Tickets I (for Beta)](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/VI-154 ) 
*[TM SDK Support 2023](https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/suites/view/576604&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc ) **revisit with migration of TM Ignite SDK integration
